Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2009 03:25PM markie1122 wrote: What a blessing to find this site and this discussions thread!  I begin chemo tomorrow 9/11.  I will have C+A x4 and Tx4.  Double mastectomy on July 29 with reconstruction.  Infection in the flaps needed more surgery 2 weeks later, but healing fine now.  The more I read about chemo and the side effects, the scarier it gets.  I have wonderful support from family (especially hubby), friends and church members though.  Have ordered my wig and am ready to get started and then get it all behind me.  Maybe a Caribbean cruise in February???
Posts.Title: Starting chemo September 2009 krcll sanaisa
